question_text: Which scenario would most likely require the use of a loopback plug?
answer_options: Diagnosing a faulty cable run between switches
Verifying a laptop’s Ethernet port functionality
Measuring DHCP lease duration on a router
correct_answer: Verifying a laptop’s Ethernet port functionality
explanation: Loopback plugs are used to test if a network interface, like an Ethernet port, is able to transmit and receive data internally.
